definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to compare/to dispute/compared to/(before adj.) relatively/comparatively/rather/also pr. [jiao3]
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: The day range inside of the forest is smaller than outside, and the light variety is more even slow.
sentences.chinese: 日較差林內小於林外，林內光照變化比較平緩。

sentences.english: The yearly averaged temperature range also displays significant declining trends in most parts of China.
sentences.chinese: 年平均日較差也顯示了較強的下降趨勢。
